sentence.Network_en: I felt loath to sully the gleaming brass knocker by handling it.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不愿意伸手去抓那闪亮的黄铜门环，怕把它弄脏。

sentence.Network_en: He was loath to admit his mistake.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不愿承认自己的错误。

sentence.Network_en: He is loath to get out of bed on cold mornings.
sentence.Network_cn: 在寒冷的早晨他讨厌起床.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以l开头的英语英文单词 ... loam 沃土 loath 不情愿的,勉强的 loathe 赠恨，厌恶.
英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... lithe 柔软的>笨拙的 loath 不情愿的>渴望的 lofty 高的>下降的.
雅思英语完整版_馆档网 ... loan 借出物，贷款；借出 v.借 loath 不愿意的 loth 不愿意的.
喜欢-的英语翻译-bab.la词典 ... 喜欢的 fond 不喜欢的 loath 更喜欢 prefer.

list.abs: they loathe Bronka Ginsberg but aren't about to cross her .他们厌恶勃隆卡?京斯贝格，但不想和她作对。
ooh - did i say that i loathe you oh ., 我曾经说过厌恶你么.
I tell you I loathe and abhor my husband and I utterly despise him ., 我告诉你 , 我厌恶 , 憎恨我的丈夫 , 我彻底地看不起他!
I loathe you !, 我讨厌你!
loath什么意思及同义词... ... lief or loath 不管愿不愿意 nothing loath 很愿意,很乐意 loath to depart 送别的曲子.
loath的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... be loath for him to go 不愿意他去 nothing loath 很愿意, 很高兴.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English lāth 'hostile, spiteful', of Germanic origin; related to Dutch leed, German Leid 'sorrow'

entry.tran: 不乐意的；不情愿的；勉强的
entry.def: If you are loath to do something, you do not want to do it.

example.ex: She is loath to give up her hard-earned liberty...
example.tran: 她不愿放弃好不容易得来的自由。

example.ex: The new finance minister seems loth to cut income tax.
example.tran: 新任财政部长似乎不愿削减所得税。

means.word_mean: 1. unwillingness to do something contrary to your custom;

sentences.sentence: "loath to go on such short notice"

auth_sentence.content: I was loath to leave this delightful inn.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was loath to leave this delightful inn.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was loath to leave this delightful inn.

auth_sentence.content: Yet coalition ministers were loath to resort to heavy-handed interference.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet coalition ministers were loath to resort to heavy-handed interference.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet coalition ministers were loath to resort to heavy-handed interference.

auth_sentence.content: So though I loath to admit it I can't imagine time travel.
auth_sentence.res_content: So though I loath to admit it I can't imagine time travel.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So though I loath to admit it I can't imagine time travel.

sentences.en: He is loath to get out of bed on cold mornings.
sentences.cn: 在寒冷的早晨他讨厌起床。

sentences.en: Children are very conservative where food is concerned,they are very loath to try anything out of the ordinary.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在食物上非常保守,他们非常不愿意尝任何特殊的东西。
